name: UpdateSessionConfigurations
description:
Create or update session configurations in PagerDuty.

This tool is used to create or update session configurations for a PagerDuty account. Changes will apply immediately to new sessions, and existing sessions of specified types will be revoked. Early access is required, and scoped OAuth with `session_configurations.write` permission is necessary.

parameters.name: session_configuration_type
parameters.description: Specify session configuration type: 'mobile', 'web', or a comma-separated list of both.

value_schema.description: Session configuration type. This can be either 'mobile' or 'web', or a comma-separated list of both.

parameters.name: accept_versioning_header
parameters.description: Used as a versioning header for the API. Specify the version of the API you wish to use.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type_header
parameters.description: Specifies the media type of the request. Must be 'application/json'.

parameters.name: absolute_session_time_to_live_seconds
parameters.description: Specify the absolute session time to live in seconds.

value_schema.description: Absolute session time to live in seconds

parameters.name: idle_session_time_to_live
parameters.description: Specify the idle session time to live in seconds. This determines how long a session remains active without activity before being terminated.

value_schema.description: Idle session time to live in seconds
